Articles.Content:
Is there any other mod like ship effects? I would love to get a sound mod that makes ships creak, rumble, hiss, and some other SoundFX.

 

Can anyone list some mods, that are still being MANTAINED? And that it works with the upcoming 1.1? Or at least 1.0.5

 

Cheers,

Table

I have been wondering this too. Atmospheric Sound Enhancement was great too, especially paired with ship effects. Maybe @pizzaoverheadcan shine some light on the subject? I know he said he was interested in implementing this on 1.1 at some point down the line. I wouldn't expect anything until after the official 1.1 release though. Atmospheric Sound Enhancement works with 1.0.5 though if you are interested in that.

Edited April 11, 2016 by Berlin

ShipEffects does work with 1.0.5; it won't show up on CKAN, but you can still install it manually.

I read that Chatterer has some ship atmospheric sounds, too, but I'm not sure since I have ShipEffects installed.
Yeah I figured the OP knew that but was asking for other recommendations. None of the sound mods besides chatterer works in 1.1 though unfortunately.

Well that's a shame, I was looking for a more immersive experience. But that's ok! Oh, and I don't think Chatterer has sounds, except for all that chatter

P.S. Is Atmospheric sounds still being mantained?

Anyways, thanks guys!

pizzaoverhead is still around and plans on a 1.1 update for atmospheric sound enhancements at some point.  I know it works in 1.0.5

Edited April 11, 2016 by Berlin

On 4/11/2016 at 11:05 AM, Berlin said:

pizzaoverhead is still around and plans on a 1.1 update for atmospheric sound enhancements at some point.  I know it works in 1.0.5

Ah, thanks alot man
